TextLibrary.Text: Gruulkar is building a new weapon in the village of Snake Fang. We need you to find it and destroy it.
Gruulkar is building a new weapon in the village of Snake Fang. We need you to find it and destroy it.

Gruulkar is building a new weapon in the village of Snake Fang. We need you to find it and destroy it.
We're not sure. All we know is that it will be something he can use to lay siege to the city of Dhun-Kor.
